column2: I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.
column3: J'ai exprimé mon souhait et mon désir d'être couronné à Rome par Sa Sainteté le Pape. Avec bon espoir il accèdera à ma requête et je pourrais commencer à inviter mes seigneurs pour qu'ils assistent au couronnement.
column4: Ich äußerte meine Wünsche und Sehnsüchte für eine Krönung in Rom, um seine Heiligkeit der Papst. Hoffentlich wird er akzeptieren meine Bitte, damit ich anfangen kann meine Herren einladen, um die Krönungszeremonie beizuwohnen.
column5: I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.
column6: I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.

column2: Of course he will accept
column3: Bien sûr il acceptera.
column4: Natürlich wird er akzeptieren
column5: Of course he will accept
column6: Of course he will accept

column2:
To the most Reverend and Blessed Apostolic Pope,

I would like to ask you for your blessing in my rule as Emperor-elect by holding officially holding a coronation ceremony in my honour.

Your most devoted subject,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
Au Vénérable et Bienheureux Pape Apostolique,

J'aimerais vous demander votre bénédiction pour mon règne en tant qu'Empereur-élu par la tenue d'une cérémonie de couronnement en mon honneur.

Your most devoted subject,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
Zu den vererten und seligen Apostolischen Papst, würde 

l nich möchte Ihnen für Ihren Segen bitten werdet in meinem Herrschaft als Kaiser-elect, indem offiziell im Besitz einer Krönungszeremonie in meiner Ehre. 

 Euer ergebener Diener

column2: To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nIn the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome, as Holy Roman Emperor, under my guidance.
column3: Au Pieux et Sérénissime [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nAu nom de Notre Seigneur, moi, [From.GetTitledName], voudrais vous offrir ma bénédiction pour votre couronnement à Rome, comme Saint Empereur Romain, par moi conseillé.
column4: An den frommen und heitern [Root.GetTitledFirstName], \nIm Namen des Herrn, Ich, [From.GetTitledName], möchte Ihnen meinen Segen anbieten, Ihre Krönung in Rom zu ermöglichen, als römisch-deutscher Kaiser, unter meiner Anleitung .
column5: To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nIn the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome, as Holy Roman Emperor, under my guidance.
column6: To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nIn the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome, as Holy Roman Emperor, under my guidance.

column2: Excellent, send out the a message to invite all my lords
column3: Excellent, envoyez les invitations à mes seigneurs.
column4: Ausgezeichnet,  sende eine Nachricht an alle meine Lords
column5: Excellent, send out the a message to invite all my lords
column6: Excellent, send out the a message to invite all my lords

column2:
To his Majesty [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
In the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to inform you that I deem you are not yet worthy and just enough as a ruler to be offered my blessings to become crowned as the Holy Roman Emperor. The Lord surely has much faith in you as you have in him, but remember that the honour of receiving His blessing does not come easy and is only for the purest of souls.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
A Sa Majesté [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Au nom de Notre Seigneur, moi, [From.GetTitledName], voudrais vous informer que je ne vous juge pas encore assez digne et juste comme souverain pour vous octroyer ma bénédiction en tant que Saint Empereur Romain couronné. Le Seigneur à sûrement plus de foi en vous que vous en Lui, mais n'oubliez pas que l'honneur de recevoir Sa Bénédiction n'est pas chose aisée et est réservé aux plus pures des âmes.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An seine Majestät [Root.GetTitledFirstName], 
 Im Namen des Herrn, I, [From.GetTitledName], möchte Ihnen mitteilen, dass ich erachten Sie sind noch nicht würdig und gerade genug, wie ein Herrscher meinen Segen angeboten werden gekrönt zu werden, wie die römisch-deutscher Kaiser. Der Herr hat sicher viel Vertrauen in Sie, wie Sie zu ihm haben, aber denken Sie daran, dass die Ehre zuteil, seinen Segen kommt nicht einfach und ist nur für den reinsten Seelen. 
 gezeichnet, 
 [From.GetTitledName]
column5:
To his Majesty [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

column2: Why can't he ever just say:"No"!

column2:
To Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You should be happy to know that, I, [From.GetTitledName], will hold a coronation ceremony in Rome in my honour with the blessing of his Holiness the Pope. You received the honour to be invited to attend the ceremony, which will be held soon in Rome. I await your postive reply.

Your most Holy Lord and Liege,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
Au Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Vous devriez heureux être d'apprendre que moi, [From.GetTitledName], vais organiser une cérémonie de couronnement à Rome en mon honneur avec la bénédiction de Sa Sainteté le pape. Vous avez l'honneur d'être inviter pour assister à la cérémonie, qui devrait avoir lieu sous peu à Rome. J'attends votre réponse positive.

Votre Très Saint seigneur et suzerain,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An den edlen [Root.GetTitledFirstName], 
 Sie sollen froh zu wissen sein das , ich, [From.GetTitledName], eine Krönungszeremonie in Rom zu meinen Ehren halten werde ,mit dem Segen Seiner Heiligkeit des Papstes. Sie erhielt die Ehre , um dieser Zeremonie, die in Kürze in Rom stattfinden soll eingeladen zu werden. Ich erwarte Ihre positive Antwort. 

euer allerheiligster Herr, 
[From.GetTitledName]

To Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

column2: In the name of Christ, I, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promise, pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her, however many, in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.
column3: Au Nom du Christ, moi, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promet, m'engage et jure devant Dieu et le bienheureux Apôtre Pierre que je serais le protecteur et le défenseur de la très sainte Eglise Romaine, que je la servirais en toutes occasions, ou au moins dans de nombreuses, dans la mesure où je suis soutenu par la divine assistance et en accord avec mes propres connaissances et capacités.\n\nAujourd'hui [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et a formellement reçu le titre de "Saint Empereur Romain" et les Regalia Impériaux avec la bénédiction du Pape.
column4: Im Namen Christi, Ich, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], Versprechen, Unterpfand und Garant in den Augen Gottes und der seligen Apostel Petrus, dass ich der Beschützer und Verteidiger dieser heiligen römischen Kirche in allen ihren Formen nützlich, um ihr zu sein, jedoch viele, soweit ich durch göttlichen Beistand bin nach meinem Wissen und Können unterstützt. \n\n Heute [Root.GetTitledFirstName] wurde von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel "Kaiser" und das Imperial Ornat mit dem Segen des Papstes.
column5: In the name of Christ, I, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promise, pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her, however many, in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.
column6: In the name of Christ, I, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promise, pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her, however many, in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.

column4: Heute wurde ich von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel "Kaiser" und der Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been crowned and received the Imperial Regalia by his holiness the Pope in the St. Basilica in Rome. The divine blessings conveyed by his Holiness the Pope confirm the right of rule over all Imperial lands governed by [From.GetTitledFirstName] and his appointed vassals.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné et a reçu les regalia Impériaux par Sa Sainteté le Pape en la Sainte Basilique de Rome. Les bénédictions divines transmisent par Sa Sainteté le Pape confirme son droit de régner sur toutes les terres Impériales gouvernées [From.GetTitledFirstName] et ses vassaux fieffés.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] wurde gekrönt und erhielt die Reichskleinodien von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst in der Basilika St. in Rom. Die Devine Segen vermittelt durch seine Heiligkeit, der Papst das Recht der Regel bestätigen, über alle kaiserlichen Ländereien von [From.GetTitledFirstName] und seine Vasallen ernannten geregelt.
column5: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been crowned and received the Imperial Regalia by his holiness the Pope in the St. Basilica in Rome. The divine blessings conveyed by his Holiness the Pope confirm the right of rule over all Imperial lands governed by [From.GetTitledFirstName] and his appointed vassals.

column2: Enacting this decision will result in a request to the Pope for a coronation ceremony to be held at Rome in honour of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will allow [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to become crowned and blessed by the Pope and extend your authority as the ruler of the Holy Roman Empire, which further legitimises your rule.
column3: Promulguer cette décision entrainera l'envoi d'une requête au Pape, lui demandant d'organiser une cérémonie de couronnement à Rome en l'honneur de [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Cela autorisera [Root.GetTitledFirstName] à être couronné et bénit par le Pape et d'accroître son autorité comme souverain du Saint Empire Romaine  as the ruler of the Holy Roman Empire, ce qui légitimera également votre règne.
column4: Erlass dieser Entscheidung wird einen Antrag an den Papst für eine Krönungszeremonie, die in Rom zu Ehren von [Root.GetTitledFirstName] stattfinden wird, zur Folge haben. Dies ermöglicht [Root.GetTitledFirstName] gesegnet durch den Papst gekrönt zu werden und erhöht die Autorität als Herrscher des Heiligen Römischen Reiches.
column5: Enacting this decision will result in a request to the Pope for a coronation ceremony to be held at Rome in honour of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will allow [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to become crowned and blessed by the Pope and extend your authority as the ruler of the Holy Roman Empire, which further legitimises your rule.
column6: Enacting this decision will result in a request to the Pope for a coronation ceremony to be held at Rome in honour of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will allow [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to become crowned and blessed by the Pope and extend your authority as the ruler of the Holy Roman Empire, which further legitimises your rule.

column2: Being crowned by the Pope and having received the Imperial Regalia symbolises the blessing of the Pope and official recognised status as the Holy Roman Emperor.
column3: Être couronné par le Pape et recevoir les Regalia Impériaux symbolisent la bénédiction du Saint Père et la reconnaissance officielle du statut de Saint Empereur Romain.
column4: Durch den Papst gekrönt und Erhalt der Reichskleinodien symbolisiert den Segen des Papstes und offiziell anerkannten Status als römisch-deutscher Kaiser.
column5: Being crowned by the Pope and having received the Imperial Regalia symbolises the blessing of the Pope and official recognised status as the Holy Roman Emperor.
column6: Being crowned by the Pope and having received the Imperial Regalia symbolises the blessing of the Pope and official recognised status as the Holy Roman Emperor.
